common.error: An unknown error has occurred. Please try again.

official.getResultError: An error occurred while requesting a run result, please try again!
official.pushError: An error occurred while submitting the code to the Codeforces server, please try again!

resultBlock.diffNote: Explanation：If there is more than one possible answer to the question, your answer may not be incorrect.

fontSizeInput.helpText: Setting the font size of the code editor
fontSizeInput.label: font size

validator.helpText: Use the specified checker to check that the results of a sample test run match the expected results
validator.label: Sample Test Result Checker

options.ignoreWhitespace: Ignore end-of-line spaces and end-of-text line breaks
options.nyesno: nyesno - matches YES and NO, case insensitive
options.rcmp4: rcmp4 - matches floating point numbers with a maximum allowable error of 1e-4
options.rcmp6: rcmp6 - match floating point numbers with a maximum allowable error of 1e-6
options.rcmp9: rcmp9 - match floating point numbers with a maximum allowable error of 1e-9

ncmp.differ: {{count}}The number of digits is different - expected: '{{expected}}', actual: '{{actual}}'
ncmp.longerExpected: Expected to contain a longer sequence [length = {{expectedLength}}], actually contains {{actualLength}} elements
ncmp.longerActual: actually contains a longer sequence [length = {{actualLength}}], expected to contain {{expectedLength}} elements

rcmp.lengthMismatch: Different number of expected and actual figures - Expected: {{expectedLength}} , Actual: {{actualLength}}

wcmp.extraTokensInParticipant: The actual output contains additional words
wcmp.unexpectedEOF: Expect the output to contain additional words

nyesno.expectedInAnswer: {{YES}} or {{NO}} should be in the expected output, but found {{token}} [page {{index}}{{ending}} token]
nyesno.expectedInOutput: {{YES}} Or {{NO}} should be in the actual output, but found {{token}} [page {{index}}{{ending}} token]
nyesno.longerInAnswer: The output is expected to contain more tokens [length = {{expectedLength}}], but the actual output contains only {{actualLength}} tokens
nyesno.longerInOutput: The actual output contains more tokens [length = {{actualLength}}], but the expected output contains only {{expectedLength}} tokens
nyesno.summary: {{index}} The number of tokens: yes is {{yesCount}}, no is {{noCount}}
